subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] New Character needed?
msgSnippet: ... I just thought of another possibility. Right now we use the private plane for our Unicode needs. Maybe it would be better to put the special colon
messageBody:
> Another possibility is using this in place of a Namer Dot, though
> the conflict of purposes may cause problems.
> As I understand it, the block-structure of Unicode assignments
> means that our current proposals have a few characters free anyway.
>

I just thought of another possibility. Right now we use the private
plane for our Unicode needs. Maybe it would be better to put the special
colon character in the private range, thus keeping free a space that
might be needed for something more important? We would need the special
colon only on rare occasions, so it wouldn't post a problem to keep it
in the private range.

Anyway, that's another possibility.

Paul
